\item {\ttfamily docs}\+: Root directory of generated documentation
\item {\ttfamily include}\+: C header files
\item {\ttfamily markdown}\+: Markdown files used when generating docs
\item {\ttfamily src}\+: C source files
\item {\ttfamily vendor}\+: Third-\/party sources
